"Oh Kamina and Simon are so much cooler than Shinji. Why couldn't Shinji be like that?"
BECAUSE BEING COOL WASN'T THE POINT OF SHINJI'S CHARACTER YOU FUCKBUTTS! I've come to realize that anyone who calls Shinji "whiny" probably hasn't watched Eva.
